column1: Amazing place! The host was very welcoming and the apartment was spotlessly clean. Would definitely stay here again!
Great location near downtown. Easy access to public transportation and restaurants.
The place was okay, nothing special. It served its purpose for a short stay.
Terrible experience. The place was dirty and nothing like the photos. The host was unresponsive.
Wonderful stay! The apartment had everything we needed and more. Beautiful view from the balcony.
Not worth the price. Very small room and the neighborhood felt unsafe at night.
Perfect for our family vacation. Kids loved the pool and the host provided great local recommendations.
The WiFi didn't work most of the time and there was construction noise all day long.
Cozy and comfortable apartment. Exactly as described. Highly recommend!
Average place for the price. Could be cleaner but the location was convenient.
Absolutely loved this place! The host went above and beyond to make our stay special.
Major disappointment. Check-in was delayed by 3 hours and the AC was broken.
Nice quiet neighborhood and comfortable beds. Good value for money.
The photos were misleading. The place is much smaller than it appears online.
Excellent amenities and super friendly host. Will definitely book again when in town!
